To finalize the day:

1. Fork [this repository](https://github.com/gerkovink/reprodev2024) and create a new branch
2. Adjust the readme to add your content in the following way

- your name
  - your Tutorial 2 GitHub repo AND a link to your rendered `Quarto` (i.e. html) file.
  - a link to the [Zenodo](https://zenodo.org) entry of your personal `R`-package
  
3. Propose the changes in a Pull Request to the original repository

Done!
